"T:The Chocolate Way 2019":
"We've received reports of rampaging
Dragonkin near the Valentine's Day venue
in the Volcanic Caves of Amduscia.
In addition to the Dragonkin, we have
reports of Phantoms joining the rampage.
All ARKS are to dispatch and eliminate
these enemies to protect the venue.
――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Time limit expires"

"Now preparing to transfer you!
Your objective is to subdue
the rampaging enemies near
the Valentine's Day venue!"

"In addition to Dragonkin, we've
detected powerful Phantom
readings! Please be careful!"

"Defeat every enemy you see, and
try not to let the girls distract you.
The Chocolate Way is in your hands!"
